description: Dr. Sandeep Batra is a senior executive in therapeutic oncology at Max Healthcare, where patients can seek master cancer care. He has more than 14 years of experience and exceptional training in treating various cancers, including gastrointestinal, gynecologic, uro-oncologic, and thoracic cancers. His patient-centric approach and commitment to advancing the field with new treatments distinguish him, along with the characteristics that originally attracted him to cancer research.

list.content: BLK Super Specialty Hospital, Delhi, Dec 2015 – Dec 2017
Medanta, The Medicity, Gurgaon, Nov 2009 – Dec 2015
Artemis Health Institute, Gurgaon, July 2009 – Oct 2009
DNB (Medicine): National Board of Examinations, Delhi
DNB (Therapeutic Oncology): National Board of Examinations, Delhi
